tool_description: Calculates performance baselines for HVAC systems using historical data to establish normal operating parameters for comparison and anomaly detection.

historical_data.description: Historical performance data points for baseline calculation

data_type.description: Type of data for baseline: energy_consumption, temperature, humidity, pressure, airflow

calculation_method.description: Baseline calculation method: average, median, percentile

seasonal_adjustment.description: Apply seasonal adjustment to baseline calculation

error_messages: Insufficient data: Minimum 100 data points required for reliable baseline calculation.
Invalid data type: Use one of [energy_consumption, temperature, humidity, pressure, airflow].
Invalid calculation method: Use one of [average, median, percentile].
Outlier threshold out of range: Value must be between 1.5 and 3.0 standard deviations.
usage: Provide historical_data array, specify data_type, and optionally set calculation_method, seasonal_adjustment, and outlier_threshold. Returns baseline metrics for performance comparison.

baseline_value.description: Calculated baseline value for the specified metric

standard_deviation.description: Standard deviation of the historical data
